Name: Bus and subway fare evasion reporting.
Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to bus and subway fare evasion reporting.
Text:
Int. No. 24

By Council Members Rose, Vacca, Gentile, Koo, Mendez, Ferreras-Copeland and Ulrich

..Title
A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to bus and subway fare evasion reporting.
..Body

Be it enacted by the Council as follows:
      Section 1.  Subdivision a of section 14-150 of the administrative code of the city of New York is amended by adding a new paragraph 9 to read as follows:
      9. A report related to theft of services on New York city transit buses and subways for the prior calendar quarter, disaggregated by bus and subway line: (i) the number of arrests by department personnel; (ii) the number of summonses issued; and (iii) the number of department personnel specifically designated to combat such theft of services.  "Theft of services" shall have the same meaning as in subdivision three of section 165.15 of the penal law.
      ï¿½2. This local law shall take effect sixty days after its enactment into law.



PC
Int. No. 919/2012 
LS #64/2014
1/23/14
